titleStmt.title: Of the Russe common wealth. Or, Maner of gouernement of the Russe emperour, (commonly called the Emperour of Moskouia) with the manners, and fashions of the people of that countrey.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Giles, 1549?-1611.

titleStmt.title: Of the Russe common wealth. Or, Maner of gouernement of the Russe emperour, (commonly called the Emperour of Moskouia) with the manners, and fashions of the people of that countrey.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Giles, 1549?-1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] D[awson] for Thomas Charde,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: G. Fletcher, i.e. Giles Fletcher the elder.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A⁴ B-P Q⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
